entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:43 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 06:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning in the morning then changing to rain showers late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
